text: Atilio Ángel Pozzobón (24 March 1938 - 12 September 2020) was an Argentine actor. He was born in Buenos Aires. He was known for his roles as Francesco in Son of the Bride (2001), as Saligani in Lost Embrace (2004) and as the movie Czar in Ay Juancito (2004). Pozzobón died on 12 September 2020 in Buenos Aires at the age of 82.Falleció el actor Atilio Pozzobón ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Argentine stage actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Atilio Pozzobón
